[Rapid Manifestation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3018) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 236 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Soulforger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=102)

**Prerequisites**
[Soulforger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3016)

**Trigger**
You roll initiative or a hazard attacks you.

</column>

---

Your unwavering soul brings up your defenses as soon as you're in danger. You Manifest your Soulforged Armament.
